name: Ivan Tyshchenko
body:
![Profile-photo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/TihonV/tihonv.github.io/master/images/profile_photo.png)
### Hi, everyone!
I was born & raised in Donetsk, worked mainly in embedded program development, traveler.

###Random Facts About Me

I've attended "Program Development" course in Donetsk Technical School of Industrial Automatics and Industrial and Economic College of National Aviation Univercity.

I mostly develop in C and C++ on POSIX systems, but I've worked on many different technologies too and mastered a good amount of them, so time to time I code in Python, bash and C# too.

I am a performance maniac, usually optimizing my code to the last bit even when it's not a performance-centric project.

###Contacts
Telephone: +38(097)4242428
Email: iv.tihon@gmail.com
